salesChannels.removeProductsWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} products from {{sales_channel}}.
salesChannels.productAlreadyAdded: The product has already been added to the sales channel.
salesChannels.deleteSalesChannelWarning: You are about to delete the sales channel {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.

list.noRecordsMessage: There are no products in the sales channel.
Create a product first.

subtitle.publishable: Manage API keys used in the storefront to limit the scope of requests to specific sales channels.
subtitle.secret: Manage API keys used to authenticate admin users in admin applications.

create.createPublishableHint: Create a new publishable API key to limit the scope of requests to specific sales channels.
create.createSecretHint: Create a new secret API key to access the Medusa API as an authenticated admin user.
create.secretKeyCreatedHint: Your new secret key has been generated. Copy and securely store it now. This is the only time it will be displayed.
create.copySecretTokenSuccess: Secret key was copied to clipboard.
create.copySecretTokenFailure: Failed to copy secret key to clipboard.

salesChannels.title: Add Sales Channels
salesChannels.description: Add the sales channels that the API key should be limited to.
salesChannels.successToast_one: {{count}} sales channel was successfully added to the API key.
salesChannels.successToast_other: {{count}} sales channels were successfully added to the API key.
salesChannels.alreadyAddedTooltip: The sales channel has already been added to the API key.

list.noRecordsMessage: There are no sales channels in the publishable API key's scope.

delete.warning: You are about to delete the API key {{title}}. This action cannot be undone.

revoke.warning: You are about to revoke the API key {{title}}. This action cannot be undone.

list.noRecordsMessage: Create a sales channel first.

removeSalesChannel.warning: You are about to remove the sales channel {{name}} from the API key. This action cannot be undone.
removeSalesChannel.warningBatch_one: You are about to remove {{count}} sales channel from the API key. This action cannot be undone.
removeSalesChannel.warningBatch_other: You are about to remove {{count}} sales channels from the API key. This action cannot be undone.
removeSalesChannel.successToast: Sales channel was successfully removed from the API key.
removeSalesChannel.successToastBatch_one: {{count}} sales channel was successfully removed from the API key.
removeSalesChannel.successToastBatch_other: {{count}} sales channels were successfully removed from the API key.

actions.copySuccessToast: API key was copied to clipboard.

returnReasons.subtitle: Manage reasons for returned items.
returnReasons.calloutHint: Manage the reasons to categorize returns.

create.subtitle: Specify the most common reasons for returns.
create.hint: Create a new return reason to categorize returns.

edit.subtitle: Edit the value of the return reason.

delete.confirmation: You are about to delete the return reason {{label}}. This action cannot be undone.

value.label: Value
value.tooltip: The value should be a unique identifier for the return reason.

login.title: Welcome to Medusa
login.hint: Sign in to access the account area

invite.title: Welcome to Medusa
invite.emailTooltip: Your email cannot be changed. If you would like to use another email, a new invite must be sent.
invite.invalidInvite: The invite is invalid or has expired.
invite.successHint: Get started with Medusa Admin right away.
invite.invalidTokenHint: Try requesting a new invite link.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.hint: Enter your email below, and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.
resetPassword.invalidTokenHint: Try requesting a new reset link.
resetPassword.successfulRequest: We've sent you an email which you can use to reset your password. Check your spam folder if you haven't received it after a few minutes.
resetPassword.successfulReset: Please login in on the login page.

edit.subtitle: Edit the value of the product tag.

delete.confirmation: You are about to delete the product tag {{value}}. This action cannot be undone.
